description:
A BGM pack distributed as part of the "Town Building 5-Item Set"

BGM within the game can be changed.
Pieces from the following titles are included in this BGM pack:

- Nights of Azure
- Nights of Azure 2: Bride of the New Moon
- BLUE REFLECTION

Note: BGM can be changed from Extra - Music Gallery.
name: GUST 25th Anniversary "BGM pack 2"
